column4: I am trying to access a directory I made before (specifically gnome-terminal, to backup my terminal profile, etc.). Now when I try to cd, do anything, I get "Permission denied.". How can I fix this?
chmod if the owner is you, otherwise chown to make it yours then set privs
I have tried both "sudo chmod -R dirpathhere    sudo chown -R dirpathhere", still have issue?
